nodes.text: Sarsius Torne was a male Thyrsian who served as a Sun Guard mercenary within Zeta Magnus' Empire. Based deep in Wild Space, Torne was stationed at Rennak Palace at the heart of the Dark Worlds.

A male Thyrsian, Sarsius Torne was trained as a Sun Guard and found employment deep within the Dark Worlds as a servant to the crazed geneticist Zeta Magnus. Serving as the prime clone for several of Magnus' experiments, he trained Tark Squad, a set of four clone commandos that were designed to infiltrate the Grand Army of the Republic as part of Magnus' deal with Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Sidious to recover Anakin Skywalker.
